title: What was the most covert operation ever performed by a country? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think that the joined operation that the CIA and the BND have run for decades and allowed them to decrypt coded messages by many countries.The CIA and the BND had achieved that by buying and operating the company that provided encryption systems. https://www.washingtonpost.com/graphics/2020/world/national-security/cia-crypto-encryption-machines-espionage/
